name: Qatar PayLater
title: Qatar PayLater Makes Payments Simple, Smart, and Seamless
description: Intuitive Buy Now, Pay Later Rollout
logoDesc: Qatar Pay Later (PayLater) is a Shari’a-compliant BNPL platform aligned with Qatar’s vision for inclusive, digitized financial access. Supporting both online and in-store payments, it partners with institutions like Qatar Islamic Bank (QIB) to offer flexible, interest-free payment solutions across the nation.

name: Friendi Pay
title: FriendyPay Turns Your Phone into Kuwait’s Most Trusted Wallet

logoDesc: FriendiPay is a secure digital wallet app built for users in Kuwait, offering a simple way to pay, send money, top up mobile, and manage bills — all from a smartphone. Designed for inclusivity and ease, the platform helps customers perform daily financial tasks quickly and safely, with support for multiple languages and local merchant integrations.
